name: Lotus Domino Key Ring File
summary: Learn about .KYR files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The server's key ring filename appears in Internet Site documents configured by the server administrator. The default filename of the key ring generated by Lotus Domino/Notes is "KEYFILE.KYR."

description: Password-protected binary file that stores secure certificates on a Lotus Domino server; used for authenticating SSL and other secure connections; must be signed by a certifying authority to be valid.
